item.title: How We Replaced Some of the Wiring on this Old Car!
item.description: What does it take to repair the electrics on a classic? This video documents the complex process of replacing the wiring harness on this old car, showing the meticulous steps required for a successful restoration.

media:content.media:title: How We Replaced Some of the Wiring on this Old Car!
media:content.media:description: What does it take to repair the electrics on a classic? This video documents the complex process of replacing the wiring harness on this old car, showing the meticulous steps required for a successful restoration.

item.title: Truly the best SUV on the road! Let CAR WIZARD show you why this '08 Lexus GX470 is so reliable!
item.description: Join the CAR WIZARD for a deep dive into the 2008 Lexus GX470. We'll show you why this model is considered one of the most reliable SUVs on the road, covering its common maintenance points and strengths.

item.title: Reliable Cars Between $6k - $8k!
item.description: What are the toughest, most dependable used cars you can get for $6,000 to $8,000? This video reviews the top-rated models known for their longevity and low maintenance costs.

item.title: 90's Time Warp! Why does the CAR WIZARD have this minty 1990 Mustang GT fox body in his shop?
item.description: Go inside the shop with CAR WIZARD for a blast from the past! This video dives into the secrets of a mint-condition 1990 Mustang GT Fox Body, revealing why this classic muscle car is in the shop and what repairs it needs.

item.title: Her Brakes Were Locking up!
item.description: What happens when a car's brakes suddenly lock up? This video documents the urgent diagnostic process to find the cause of a dangerous brake failure and the expert steps required to fix it safely.

item.title: The Battery is no Good!
item.description: This video is a guide to diagnosing a bad battery. We'll show you the warning signs of failure and the correct, safe way to replace it and get your vehicle starting reliably again.

item.title: They Call it The World Engine!
item.description: Why is this engine called the "World Engine"? This video breaks down the Global Engine Alliance design, revealing how this motor was engineered to be a powerful and durable workhorse for cars around the globe.

item.title: Breaking Down the W123: Is This Car REALLY Unbreakable?
item.description: This video explores the engineering behind the W123, showing why it's considered an icon of longevity and discussing the necessary maintenance to keep it on the road for decades.

item.title: Nissan Murano Concerns About The Brake Fluid!
item.description: We'll show you the common reasons for brake fluid loss in a Nissan Murano and the expert diagnostic steps required to fix the problem

item.title: Can’t Believe What I Found: 1999 Cadillac Eldorado
item.description: Go inside the shop for a shocking find. We'll show you the surprising secrets we uncovered in this 1999 Cadillac Eldorado and the unusual issues that needed to be addressed.

item.title: The Stock Exhaust on my R8!
item.description: What does a V10 engine sound like with the factory exhaust? This video goes inside the sound and performance of my Audi R8's stock system, proving that sometimes, factory is best.

item.title: Best & Worst Full Size, 1/2 Ton Gas Trucks!
item.description: This expert review explores the full-size, half-ton gas truck segment. We break down the highest-rated models and reveal the least reliable trucks you should avoid buying.

item.title: No Brake Fluid Leakage!
item.description: What happens when your brakes feel spongy but there's no visible fluid leak? This video documents the complex diagnosis to find the hidden cause of a critical brake problem.

item.title: I Just Want to Cruise with my R8!
item.description: We'll show you the costly, complex problems that prevent a simple cruise and the expert fixes required to get this R8 back on the road.

item.title: How Simple Wires in your Car can Cost You Thousands!
item.description: What happens when a simple wire causes a major failure? This video documents the complex diagnosis and the surprising repair that shows how tiny electrical issues can lead to thousands in costs.

item.title: A Very Good Toyota V6 Engine!
item.description: What makes this Toyota V6 engine so highly rated? This deep-dive breaks down its design, power, and legendary durability, showing why it's a favorite among mechanics and drivers.

item.title: Why is this Toyota so Loud?
item.description: This video documents a challenging diagnostic job. We’ll show you a common problem that is making this Toyota loud and the expert steps required

item.title: Government Seized This Porsche from the Owner!
item.description: What happens when the government seizes a luxury car? This video documents the surprising story behind this Porsche’s seizure, detailing the reasons and the legal aftermath of the forfeiture.

item.title: The Customer was Done with this Car!
item.description: Go inside a complex diagnostic job. We’ll show you a car with a major problem that proved to be the final straw for the owner, detailing the issues that made them walk away.

item.title: This Truck Starts Quick!
item.description: This video documents a perfect engine start. We'll show you the power and efficiency of this truck's engine and the techniques that keep it running smoothly even in the cold.
